summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with the Butterfly Trust for the period of July 1, 2018, to July 31, 2018. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned during this period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of July 2018 was $734,736.63.
The account earned interest of $561.19 during the month of July 2018.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF (non-sufficient funds) charges during this statement period.
The ending balance as of July 31, 2018, was $734,736.63.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
